ROdimus/SEdna:

"Well Senda"replie ROdimus while he moved a chair where she could 
see him "What happen with Nightlight? and what is that mission?" 

"She doesn't know what it's goin on... I can control her body 'cause 
I insolate her spark, in that way that her sense can't registrate 
what's goin on outside... but every damage that some one do to her 
body just her will suffer it!!!" 

"Why is she so important that you decided to control her?!!" said 
Rodimus almost angered and worry.

"'cause I finally decided that it's time that I personaly take 
control of situation"replied the Vork

"Are you meaning that... you was inside before Unicron's arrival? 
How could It be? "

"My masters knew that someone else will arrive to destroy our 
lab..." started to say the vork"so I had the command to find a drone 
and take its body, but I choose one whose spark still was alive but 
slowly was dying, it just was time that I were the owner of its 
body, so I just waited; time passed and that pod was found for you 
and that doggie bot..."

"WHAT!?" said suprised Rodimus

"SO do you didn't know that you rescued her pod???? and where you 
brought her here???"said the Vork almost laughting"you never figured 
that you found her ???? well well that's not the subject; After that 
the wolfbot brought her here and with this IDIOT's help" she said 
that words looking to Kenzo "Her spark didn't vanished... So I 
decided to wait, wait until I know if would be needed my 
intervention... at first I consider influence her... bur she's wake, 
wake and afraid to hurt some one even if her live is at risk... hHer 
reaction after destroy that Unicron's minion confirmed that... SO I 
decided that it's time that I do something and took control of her 
and insolate her spark, it was pretty easy: she was emotionaly 
exausted... Now That I'm in control... I have to start the mission 
that my masters order me..."






--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:

> >

roared

> >

> > 
> > "WE HAVE NOT ANYTHING TO CHAT!!!!" snarled the femme.
> > 
> > "We have..."replied ROdimus"Who're you? and why are you 
controlling 
> > Nightlight...!!!"
> > 
> > "ASK HIM!!!!!" Motioned her head to Kenzo"Or your friend hasn't 
> > payed attention what I told him?"
> > 
> > Rodimus looked to Kenzo as if he expected a conrfirmation about 
what 
> > she was telling
> > 
> "She identified herself as Sedna, a Vork.  She mentioned something
> about a mission.  That's when I contacted you and attempted a 
stasis
> lock on Nightlight.  She blew open the chamber from the inside
> becoming a danger to herself so I tried to restrain her.  That's 
when
> the struggle that you saw broke out."  Kenzo summarized.
